summary: Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADI) is included among the 12 Best Dividend Paying Stocks to Buy Now. Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADI) develops and sells high-performance analog, mixed-signal, and digital signal processing chips that power a wide range of uses, including industrial automation, automotive systems, consumer electronics, and advanced communications networks.
